评论概述: Great shirt in all ways!  RUNS LARGE
评论详情: I am a solid size 10, but I had to exchange for a SMALL, and it was still not form fitting.  Love this shirt, the mottled colors, the design, the fabric (not too thick or thin).  It is slightly tapered at the waist, but not really form fitting.  Purchased several colors!
Fits nicely. Good quality, washed and dried beautifully. Very comfortable and cute.
great
Looks nice and I like the geometric design. The material is thin. I went by Amazon's size suggestion and got a large. It fits but it clings a little, so I'm on the fence if I'll return it.

I bought two different colors of this product at the same time. Both were the same size. However, the black one fit slightly snugger as it seemed to be made of different fabric. The other one, a brown/gray color fit just right.
Runs large, looks nice for the price
I really like this shirt, it fits perfect and didn't shrink to much in the dryer.  color was spot on and I get lots of compliments on it.
The shirt is light and material is comfortable. The pattern is distinctive without being obvious.
Good  sizing was correct

This t-shirt is very soft and comfortable. I love the heathered color. It fits relaxed on me. I am short, 5'3", so I get good butt coverage. It washes well. I've washed several times on cold, medium heat dry and have not had an issue with shrinkage or color loss. The price is very affordable. I plan to get a few more colors.

I wear this to work and it's comfortable and the design makes it not look like a t-shirt. It's not real thick and it doesn't cling tightly to you. It's perfect for fall and spring weather. The size is my normal and it's a perfect fit.
Shirt is fine I just have an issue with the color. It looks nothing like the picture and is a weird light brown.
Really pleased with the shirt.  Great product for the price.  Washes nice.
The top was to big.  The top fit like an extra Large.  Not wroth the money
stitching across the front is not flattering

评论概述: Recharged my card even though I returned item
评论详情: This review highlights a frustrating experience with the company’s return process and customer service. Here's a revised version for clarity and readability:  ---  Review: This review is not about the product itself, which was of decent quality. I originally ordered a medium, which turned out to be too small. I returned it and ordered an extra-large, but it was too big, so I returned that as well. They initially credited my account but later claimed I never sent the item back and charged my card again.  I provided all the tracking information I had and reached out to customer service multiple times, but I never received a response. Ultimately, they charged my card, and I lost $30. It's extremely upsetting that despite my efforts to resolve this, they never responded.

I love the color, feel of the material, and fit however the stitching was messy/bulky.  I’m sure it was just because the thread ran out and was restarted.  I was able to snip some of the thread so I can wear.  Hoping it washes without unraveling. I would buy again.

This shirt is a good value for the price. It's so comfortable and easy to use with multiple outfits. The size was a perfect fit. I wear a large and bought a large. I got the white and it's thicker than I expected. I will still wear an undershirt with the white. Would definitely but this in other colors.

I love a great white top for anything from leggings to under a blazer. I like this because there is a little white on white stitch design to give a "little character".  It feels good on and washes well in cold and tumble dry low heat.  I just purchased it in another color because it's perfect this time of year to put under a cardigan. You're going to love it!
Wine/burgundy color isn’t as deep in color as seen.  Material is soft and generous loose fit.
Beautiful color, stays shaped after washing, for beautifully. Would buy every color.
This shirt is lightweight but cozy, fits perfect - I ordered a Medium and it has a small amount of detail, so it doesn't look plain!

I need to just start building my winter clothes up again and getting some long sleeve shirts that would work with layering given that I'm in a environment that will be freezing in the morning in 60s or 70s midday. This is an excellent option for layering and I like that the sleeves are long and the length of it is long as I am 5'11 and like a longer fitting shirt. I love it and I bought other colors of the same style and brand
It was a great price and nice material. Nothing super wow about it but good color and softness.
the design allows these to look good alone, or paired with a cardigan.  feel good too so I bought 4 colors
I would say this is very comfortable and cute.  I washed it several times and comes out perfectly.  It’s soft and not see thru.  I would say sleeves are a little long but I have short arms.
Like the style fit. Washes and dries nicely
This shirt is true to size unlike so many other shirts I’ve recently purchased. I like the seams on the front that makes it look different than a normal t-shirt. The fit is flattering!
This fits well and is very soft, sleeves are long enough. I'm 5'10" 115 lbs and ordered a large which fits. Really like the unusual coffee grey color. Shipped quickly, thanks!

评论概述: Important that it fits properly and it does not.
评论详情: Its more a large than a medium, material is way to thin for a winter top. Colore is nice...but the rest not as I hoped. Not a good deal if you ask me.
Comfortable and easy washing. Great fit as well for someone who is long waisted and has long arms.
Perfect fit and comfortable
Love the fit color and style!
Fabric was nice but the sleeves are terribly long.
Fits as expected and it's fairly light and comfortable to wear.
Did not use,did not like quality of material
Nice and soft great value fabric has a good quality fits good
Fit perfect, nice material and length
Great shirt! Super comfy and cute! Material seems a little stretchy like it could stretch out in the future and end up being baggy in a way. Besides that this shirt is really great!
Love these shirts, I now have 4 of them.

评论概述: The Small is too big! It’s like a large
评论详情: Just the size!

评论概述: Soft smooth fabric. Very light weight. Smooth silk outside - soft fabric inside.
评论详情: Fits well, washes nicely.  Arrived quickly.

评论概述: Great long sleeve t with a little something extra
评论详情: I love shirts like these for those transitional days between seasons. This t-shirt is the perfect basic, great for wearing by itself and also as a great layering piece. I love the subtle detail on the front that gives it a little something extra. These types of basics are a must have in any closet and are very versatile. Soft and comfortable, true to size in the small I ordered.

评论概述: Color is exact and fits perfect
评论详情: Really like everything about this. the fit is not too long, but not a crop top; soft and the color is exactly as showing (I bought blue). Ordering a few other colors for sure!
It’s what I expected, I’m satisfied.

评论概述: Great looking upgraded long sleeve t shirt!
评论详情: Super flattering fit. Machine washable. Looks better than your average long sleeved t-shirt. Perfect for layering on cooler days and great on its own. Soft, thin material that doesn't seem to wrinkle much and isn't weird and clingy. Hangs just right Looks more expensive than price. I loved so much that I bought in 3 neutral colors.

评论概述: Color isn't quite true - but otherwise great!
评论详情: I know that colors aren't always true on the web, but this was nothing like wine. I guess it was more a "heather" wine (i.e. lighter). HOWEVER, this is a really comfy, soft and flattering t-shirt. I got the medium, and am 5'6" 135 lbs with a lil "meno-belly" which this disguises quite nicely.
Love this item!  Comfortable, sizing was spot in & super cute.
This is a great top. It's comfortable and fits me nicely. The pattern is subtle but unique, and the color is the same pretty muted blue that they show in the pictures. I love it!
Very nice and well made.
gteat

My wife is a teacher, so she likes to look professional, but casual. This top is PERFECT! The fit is amazing and the quality is perfect! She gets lots of compliments! She loves the little lines and the pattern on it! It goes with all of her outfits and its amazing!
True to size.  Not too heavy.  Length of sleeves and shirt is perfect.
I was excited to receive a shirt that actually fit. Material was soft and flexible. Would purchase again.
This shirt is as described. It is soft and comfortable and the design gives it a bit dressier look than a regular tshirt. It fits true to size.

I ordered this shirt because it seemed like something simple to pair with joggers, but the shirt sits very weirdly on my body and pulls at the wrong places, which to me, shows that this was not designed with inclusive sizes in mind.  The mulberry in the picture is different than in the picture, much more muted not as rich. The design across the chest is fine, a nice raised embroidery, but overall I would recommend another shirt for girls with curves.
This shirt is wonderful! Very soft and flattering. Color is exactly like picture. Great value for the money!

Just what I expected. It feels soft and fits perfect!
Material is soft, holds up in the wash, fits great!
Fits well and warm for winter!
Wears well, long lasting.

Love these shirts! They feel great and are true to size! I’ve bought almost all the colors and wear them to work!
Nice
Like the color and fit..Would buy it again hope there are more colors…

Shirt was very cute and fit well.

The color on this was supposed to be navy, it is not.  Not a bad color, but not navy.  It is very lightweight, thought it might be a bit heavier material.  Size was true.  I ordered an XL.  I am 5'6 and 180#.  I would not have wanted to order any smaller.  Will probably have to be careful when washing to make sure it doesn't shrink.
Good quality for the price. Would say it is just a little on the small size but not bad. Comfortable and black color is solid, not see through

So happy with this. Simple, yet unique in style and cute! Very soft material. I chose a color that paired great w/ black pants or jeans, and I assume ALL the shades offered would. Fits perfect, as described! Casual, yet office appropriate.
I like that the sleeves are long enough and the color is just right.

评论概述: Fit, color and style was as shown/described.
评论详情: Love the fit and the look of this. Get lots of complements when I wear it.
5’8, 155lbs. Bought a size large. Fits great, but has a slimmer fit than expected. Fabric is jersey material. Comfortable, flattering fit.
I love the color. It fits perfectly and is just right for cooler weather. The material is nice and soft. Washes well. Would purchase again.
Fit true to size

This top is as described. Seems to run small. Would have been better to order a size up. It is a little tight but if you want that looks order your regular size. I tend to go for the oversize look. Washes great. Don't know if it shrinks when dried. I have air dried it every time. Good price.
The shirt overall is nicely made but the quality is a bit see through and it was longer than the one in the picture.

This top is well made and very soft.  I ordered the pink - the photo is fairly accurate - it is a light, cool-toned pink.  But, I had to return it because it was too small - it is a slim, straight cut in the mid-section.  The sleeves were also too tight.
These are the best fitting jeans!  So flattering!  Inseam is perfect for me, for reference Iam 5’ 4”. Perfect length for boots.
I wear size 10. Since i don't like shirts clingy I ordered a large and am happy with the fit and appearancee. It washed nicely, but I let it hang dry.
I like the color and fit of this shirt. Looks good under cardigans.

评论概述: Nice basic roomy long sleeve shirt
评论详情: I normally take small- medium but gained some weight in my belly and wanted to cover my lower mid section a bit more. So I got medium and overall it was slightly too big for me (145 lbs / 5’5”) this won’t shrink bc it’s all poly/spandex. If you want a looser wider fit in the mid section this is good. But not for a fitted slimmer look.
I liked the fit of the shirt but the wine red color was a lot more faded than what was shown online. It is more of a heathered version of the color shown
I ordered what was supposed to be Navy, but when it came it's more of a medium blue.  I can wear it but wasn't as expected.
This long sleeve shirt is very soft and comfortable. Light weight and fits great.
Very small for a medium. Did not look long in back like picture. Arm length very short.

评论概述: Size is off by a mile
评论详情: I ordered what should have been my size 14, plus a bit extra.  The shirt that came didn't even fit my size 10 daughter.  The sizing is terrible and the material is very thin.  I do not suggest at all, but if you do order one, go for 3 sizes bigger!!
This shirt is perfect for layering under flannels or wearing alone.  Washes well and is not see through.
Beautiful material, but runs small. I always wear a M, but it was too tight. I will be ordering a Large.
The shirt itself is thinner than I'd want it, but very comfortable to wear. It fits great and the quality of the fabric is nice and soft.
It is nice folor.fits great very soft Like it a lot
Fit is not flattering!
Got a medium. Probably could have bought a small. Love the color. Very lightweight.

Although the material is soft and comfortable, the quality could be a bit better. One of the creases on the front to make the lines isn't creased all the way across. Other than that, it is a great shirt that my wife really likes. The color is nice and the rest of the stitching is great. It also fit as expected, so good sizing.

I like the material, the color, the neckline but it runs small. The first two were snug but ok. If they shrink when washed they will be too tight. The third one was too tight in the arms and torso. I am returning that one and ordered the next size up. I ordered a black one and lavender one at the same time. The lavender one was stuffed in a zip bag, wrinkled. The black one was folded nicely with tissue and no wrinkles in a firm zip bag. Not sure what that was about.
It’s a very casual top, I thought the color would be a bit darker but it looks kinda washed out. Fits me like a dress, it’s kinda long. But the fit on the arms and sides was as expected.

评论概述: Good quality - step up from plain t-shirt
评论详情: It's a long sleeve t-shirt with a nice decorative but very subtle stylized front. Sleeves are nice and long so the shirt is comfortable and cozy. Not super heavy weight so a nice transition from summer to fall to winter shirt.
This top wasn’t flattering on me so I returned it.
Shirt runs a size small - order up
